item.title: markdown
item.description: markdown语法 嵌入视频 <video id="video" controls="" preload="none"> <source id="mp4" src="http://shuqi.icu:8181/?/softward/%E5%86%85%E7%BD%91%E7%A9%BF%E9%80%8F/rdp-win10.mp4"> </video> <video id="video" controls="" preload="none" poster="http://om2bks7xs.bkt.clouddn.com/2017-08-26-Markdown-Advance-Video.jpg"> <source id="mp4" src="http://om2bks7xs.bkt.clouddn.com/2017-08-26-Markdown-Advance-Video.mp4" type="video/mp4"> </video> 测试： 网络代码 音频嵌套 <audio id="audio" controls="" preload="none"> <source id="mp3" src="http://oht4nlntk.bkt.clouddn.com/Music_iP%E8%B5%B5%E9%9C%B2%20-%20%E7%A6%BB%E6%AD%8C%20%28Live%29.mp3"> </audio>
